module.name: FreePBX FOP Framework
module.changelog: *2.10.0.3* #5818 *2.10.0.2* #5496 *2.10.0.1* fix for fw_fop_parse_zapata *2.10.0.0* upgrade xml info, category, support info *2.10.0beta2.0* moving FOP to full module *2.10.0beta1.0* beta1 release, see svn log *2.9.0.1* #4401, #4914, #4404 *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
module.description: This module provides the original FOP (Flash Operator Panel) which is known to have issues on Asterisk 1.8 and is no longer supported in favor of FOP2.
module.attention: This module is known to have issues on Asterisk 1.8 and in general is no longer supported in favor of FOP2 available from the original author. The FreePBX team has very little knowledge or expertise on FOP and as a result is not in a position to provide much support
